__e: It's all about word choice. We don't need him, we need his utter lack of power, right?
I'm thinking her car trouble was more car absence, which means she was at your place all night.
not something in itself, but an absence of something;
You probably didn't even notice I wasn't at your party!
I feel a bit awkward, to be honest, with them all being away.
I'M sorry about not being here this Morning when you got back from europe.
When you're not here, there'll be a sign on your chair with your name.
Had a seizure two days ago and another one this morning.
It's like you say, sir... unless my presence here... is doing my patient more harm than my absence would, it's my duty to stay.
I just... I just black out, and...
He is going to be all right, isn't he? - You did say that, didn't you? - He'll be fine.
I thought I had blacked out and had not observed your movements.
So I just wanted you to know that while he's gone, I'm here.
- While I was away I had a chance to really put myself in your shoes, and...
A man's faith, or lack of it, is a matter for his own conscience.
All absence is death if we let ourselves know it.
I would say... at this moment our absence is more important.
